content: A new room will be created and the PDF form will be copied there. You can then invite other users to fill out the form in the room.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the content of a modal dialog that explains how a shared PDF form will be handled after being shared. The description appears in a modal dialog when inviting users to fill out a form and indicates where the form will be copied and made accessible to others.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'köçürüləcək' (moved/transferred) doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'copied'.  It implies a complete relocation, whereas 'copied' means a duplicate exists in the new room.  A more appropriate word would convey the sense of duplication.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yeni otaq yaradılacaq və PDF forması oraya **surətlənəcək**. Daha sonra digər istifadəçiləri otaqdakı formanı doldurmağa dəvət edə bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'You can then invite...' sounds slightly awkward in Spanish. A more natural phrasing would be 'Después, podrá invitar...' or 'Luego, puede invitar...'.
The word "օգտատերերի" (users) is misspelled. It should be "օգտատերեր" (users).

The phrase "ආකෘතිය පිරවීම" (aakruththi pirivamu) literally translates to 'filling the form'. While understandable, a more natural phrasing in Sinhala would be 'ආකෘතිය පුරවා' (aakruththi purawa) which means 'to fill the form'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නව කාමරයක් නිර්මාණය කර PDF ආකෘතිය එහි පිටපත් කරනු ලැබේ. කාමරයේ ඇති ආකෘතිය පුරවා ගැනීම සඳහා ඔබට වෙනත් පරිශීලකයින්ට ආරාධනා කළ හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. While grammatically correct, it feels a bit abrupt.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නව කාමරයක් නිර්මාණය කර PDF ආකෘතිය එහි පිටපත් කරනු ලැබේ. කාමරයේ ඇති ආකෘතිය පිරවීමට ඔබට වෙනත් පරිශීලකයින්ට ආරාධනා කළ හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'vanjo' in 'vanjo bo kopiran' is somewhat unnatural in this context. A more natural phrasing would be 'v njo' or 'notri'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustvarila se bo nova soba in v njo bo kopiran obrazec PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'тамo' (there) is slightly awkward in this context. It implies a very specific, close location. 'У просторији' (in the room) would be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Нова просторија ће бити креирана и PDF формулар ће бити копиран у просторији. Затим можете позвати друге кориснике да попуне формулар у просторији.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "A new room will be created" is a bit literal. A more natural Serbian phrasing would be "Otvoriće se nova prostorija" or "Kreiraće se nova prostorija".
The word 'tamo' (there) is unnecessary and makes the sentence slightly awkward.  It's implied that the PDF form is copied to the new room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nova prostorija će biti kreirana i PDF formular će biti kopiran u nju.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Consistency in capitalization. 'PDF formular' should be either consistently capitalized or consistently lowercase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nova prostorija će biti kreirana i PDF formular će biti kopiran u nju.
